product_name: Skullcandy Smokin' Buds Earbuds with Microphone
long_description: Complete with an inline mic, the Skullcandy Smokin' Buds earbuds pump hot sound and smoldering tones into your ears with the comfort and privacy of an in-ear bud design. Earbuds feature an inline mic that allows conversations on your cell phone. Skullcandy Smokin' earbuds feature 9mm-diameter speakers, 1.3m cable, 3.5mm gold-plated plug, 2 sizes of silicone buds and a hard case.
short_description: Complete with an inline mic, the Skullcandy Smokin' Buds earbuds pump hot sound and smoldering tones into your ears with the comfort and privacy of an in-ear bud design.
